body: Wait so it took 6 niggas to fully satisfy her and she was hopin one dude with zero experience could do the same? Lol she down bad
lol for real the girl want a virgin to satisfy her body which 5 guys barely made it? lmao  sorry girl im already taken
I’ve been a ntr guy for at least three months, but now that i think about it this is kinda bad, i like the art and all but, this makes me feel bad for the mc

@Troncol well if we're applying logic, a lot of girls WANT to be conquered by men. But here's the fault in this, when a guy approaches a girl, he's going to be on his very best behavior as well as fake/lie about a lot of things, so chances are the girl will end up in a relationship with a guy that never actually existed. A smart girl would observe guys from a distance, see how they act with friends and family, and then proceed to initiate relationship innuendos. But this being a hentai world, most characters are incredibly dumb. Even more so than real life.
So the only thing I don't get about stories similar to this one is that if she is so starved for sex, why doesn't she just try to do it with her boyfriend? ¯\_(ツ)_/¯
